title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook

title: American Love Story Offers a First Look at Its JFK Jr. and Carolyn Bessette — Plus, Find Out When It Premieres
description: Love is blooming this Valentine’s Day on FX. The inaugural season of Ryan Murphy’s new anthology American Love Story will premiere next February, Murphy announced on Instagram on Friday. In fact, Season 1 of Love Story — focusing on the ill-fated romance between John F. Kennedy Jr. and Carolyn Bessette — will debut during the week of […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: The Bachelor: Grant Ellis and Fiancée Juliana Split Up After 3 Months
description: Another Bachelor coupling has ended in heartbreak: Grant Ellis, the most recent star of ABC’s dating series, has announced he and his fiancée Juliana Pasquarosa have split up. The news comes less than three months after the finale of Grant’s season, which aired in March and saw Grant choose Juliana over runner-up Litia — after much […]
author: Dave Nemetz
